page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: ALL THE TYPICAL RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES OF 1985 ARE TO PURSUED IN THE LOCAL AREA.{COARSE FISHING}IS POPULAR WITH ALL AGES, WHILE{SHOOTING, (BOTH RIFLE AND SHOTGUN), IS ALSO. OTHER ADULT RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES INCLUDE;{BOWLS, BINGO, BEETLE-DRIVES, {WHIST DRIVES}AND{HORSE RIDING.}THERE ARE SOME ADULT{DANCES}ORGANISED BY SCHOOL ASSOCIATIONS WITHIN THE AREA. {CHILDREN}PLAY MANY{TRADITIONAL GAMES; E.G. SKIPPING, HOPSCOTCH, CONKERS, FLYING KITES, TREECLIMBING OR CAMPING. THE MAJOR{TEAM GAMES}ARE PLAYED BOTH BY CHILDREN AND ADULTS; NETBALL, FOOTBALL, HOCKEY, AND RUGBY, WHILE BADMINTON, TENNIS, AND SQUASH ARE POPULAR RACQUET GAMES. THE{VILLAGE}HAS CUB, SCOUT, BROWNIE AND GUIDE{GROUPS AND THE USUAL YOUTH CLUB ACTIVITIES. RARER INTERESTS INCLUDE MOTOCROSS, B.M.X. RIDING AND CYCLE SPEEDWAY.
